0.text: Innate: Periodically, upon taking  fatal damage, Anivia enters  resurrection for 6 seconds and restores all of her  health.

1.text: While in resurrection, Anivia is  unable to act and gains -40 − 20 (based on level)  bonus armor and  bonus magic resistance.

2.text: If Anivia remains alive by the end of the duration, she is revived with her current health.

0.text: Active: Anivia launches a chunk of ice in the target direction that deals magic damage to enemies hit and  slows them by 20% − 40% (based on  Glacial Storm's Rank) for 3 seconds.

1.text: Flash Frost can be recast after while the ice is in flight, and does so automatically at maximum range.

2.text: Recast: The ice shatters, dealing magic damage and  stunning nearby enemies for a duration, as well as refreshing the  slow.

0.text: Active: Anivia summons a wall of ice at the target location perpendicular to her facing,  knocking all units away from it (though not through terrain). The wall lingers as impassable terrain for 5 seconds.
Active: Anivia blasts a freezing wind at the target enemy, dealing magic damage.

1.text: If the target was hit by  Flash Frost or was inside a fully formed  Glacial Storm within the last 3 seconds, Frostbite's damage is  doubled.

0.text: Active: Anivia calls forth a driving rain of ice and hail at the target location, dealing magic damage every 0.5 seconds to enemies within and  slowing them for 1 second, refreshing every 0.5 seconds while inside. Glacial Storm can be recast after 1 second, and does so automatically if Anivia goes too far away from the storm, becomes unable to pay the  mana cost, or is affected by any form of  interrupting  crowd control.

1.text: The blizzard increases in size over 1.5 seconds. At maximum size, Glacial Storm's damage is increased by 200% and the effectiveness of its slow is increased by 50%, which also instead lasts 1.5 seconds and refreshes every 0.25 seconds while inside.

2.text: Recast: Anivia deactivates Glacial Storm, dealing one last tick of damage.

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Torment: Dealing ability damage burns enemies, causing them to take「 60 (+ 6% AP) (+ 4% target's maximum health) total magic damage over 4 seconds. 」「 15 (+ 1.5% AP) (+ 1% target's maximum health) magic damage every second for 4 seconds. 」
Unique – Agony: Deal 0% − 12% (based on target's bonus health) bonus magic damage against enemy champions.
Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 5 ability haste.

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+65 ability power
+500 mana

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Awe: Grants ability power equal to 3% bonus mana.
Unique – Mana Charge: Grants a charge every 8 seconds, up to 4 charges. Affecting an enemy or ally with an ability consumes a charge and grants 3 bonus mana, increased to 6 if it's a champion, up to maximum of 360 bonus mana.
Transforms into Seraph's Embrace at +360 mana.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – AWE: Grants ability power equal to 3% bonus mana.
